scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:all: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test
scripts.lint:all: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset && npx prisma db seed
